page.title: 05DYKE SMALLHOLDING
page.content: Devils Dyke Smallholding is an animal farm in miniature.It occupies a small piece of land between the old railway and the North-South track in{square {2609.}The farmer keeps 5 sheep and 5 lambs for breeding and then selling. He has 8 cattle and uses them for herd replacing.There is a five ton dumper truck.The man in charge has some men working for him but only on a part time basis. He buys his cows and sheep for breeding from Haywards Heath Market.He keeps chickens for their eggs and also has a sheep dog to help him. There are no other animals. The farmer does not live on the Smallholding but comes out every day to work there. He finds he often has trouble with vandals in the night when he is not there.
